accent.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to selected states and buttons.

accentForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the accent color.

danger.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to error messages.

dangerForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the error color.

dimension.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to the names of fields that are identified as dimensions.

dimensionForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the dimension color.

measure.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to the names of fields that are identified as measures.

measureForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the measure color.

primaryBackground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to visuals and other high emphasis UI.

primaryForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) of text and other foreground elements that appear over the primary background regions, such as grid lines, borders, table banding, icons, and so on.

secondaryBackground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to the sheet background and sheet controls.

secondaryForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any sheet title, sheet control text, or UI that appears over the secondary background.

success.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to success messages, for example the check mark for a successful download.

successForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the success color.

warning.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to warning and informational messages.

warningForeground.description: Color (hexadecimal) that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the warning color.
